hero.title: Chemical Innovation
hero.subtitle: Chemistry Researcher & Quality Control Analyst
description: I'm a passionate chemistry researcher dedicated to advancing sustainable and computational chemistry. My journey involves crafting molecules that matter, from organic compounds to cutting-edge nanomaterials.

As a Quality Control Analyst in the pharmaceutical industry, I ensure precision and excellence in every formulation. My expertise spans both laboratory synthesis and computational modeling, allowing me to bridge the gap between theoretical chemistry and practical applications.
